title: 250th Marine Corps Ball
location: The Hotel at Avalon, 9000 Avalon Blvd, Alpharetta, GA
description: Semper Fidelis!You are cordially invited to celebrate the 250th Anniversary of the United States Marine Corps. Join 4th Combat Readiness Regiment (formerly CLR-45)  as we honor our rich history, unwavering traditions, and the steadfast dedication of Marines, past and present. We look forward to sharing this momentous occasion with you.
